store.name: Azurite
store.description: Some gems have hidden qualities beyond their luster, beyond their shine... Azurite is one of those gems.

store.name: Bloodstone

reviews.body: I think this gem was just OK, could honestly use more shine, IMO.

reviews.body: Any gem with 12 faces is for me!
reviews.author: gemsRock@example.org

store.name: Zircon
store.description: Zircon is our most coveted and sought after gem. You will pay much to be the proud owner of this gorgeous and high shine gem.

reviews.body: This gem is WAY too expensive for its rarity value.
reviews.author: turtleguyy@example.org
